Conteudo: In light of inflation prospects, the Copom decided to reduce the Selic target by 50 basis points to 11.50 percent p.a., without bias. Four votes were for the Copom monetary policy action, while three votes were in favor of reducing the Selic target by 25 basis points. The Committee will carefully monitor the evolution of the macroeconomic scenario until the next meeting, when it will define the next steps in its monetary policy strategy. The Portuguese version of the July Copom Minutes will be released next Thursday, July 26.
